name: Building Futures
description: Emergency shelter, free counseling, court support, and housing assistance
fullDescription: Building Futures provides shelter, support services, and pathways to stability for individuals and families in Alameda County facing homelessness or unsafe home situations.
whatTheyOffer:
- 24-hour crisis line
- Emergency shelter at Sister Me Home
- Free counseling sessions
- Court accompaniment
- Children's programs
- Housing navigation
- Support groups
- Services in English and Spanish
howToGetIt:
1. Call crisis line: 1-866-292-9688
2. Speak with advocate
3. Complete intake assessment
4. Access emergency shelter
5. Receive ongoing case management
6. Work toward permanent housing
